programme.title: Lucky Voice Ep4
programme.desc: Program permainan yang menguji pengetahuan muzik dengan pelbagai hadiah menarik.

programme.title: Bottom Of The Water
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Villain & Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelist's true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jin's weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Firefighters
programme.desc: Based on the Hongje-dong fire accident in 2001, the movie depicts the harsh conditions that firefighters face every day as if it were their last mission to save lives and survive.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: A Man Of Reason
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed...

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Hear Me: Our Summer
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the world's most legendary con man.

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jin's weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Long Live The King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: Code Name: Jackal
programme.desc: Serial killer Jackal is said to appear at a hotel where K-pop star Choi Hyun is staying. Min-Jung is a hitman hired to kill Choi. Curious chemistry develops between Choi and Min-Jung.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Day I Died: Unclosed Case
programme.desc: A girl disappeared by the cliff and her body was not found. Detective took charge to investigate this mysterious disappearance.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband's funeral.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.desc: In the 1990s, oilfield children grow through change as two generations face hardships together, honoring ordinary lives during transformative times.

programme.title: Just for You Ep25
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Top Singers Ep683
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Surprise Surprise Ep13
programme.desc: This travel reality show takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. It explores hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences, offering an authentic glimpse into everything the city has to offer.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream Ep99
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan. 5

programme.title: We Are Family Ep19
programme.desc: We Are Family celebrates the inspiring journeys of new immigrants in Taiwanovercoming challenges, embracing differences, and building new lives. Through heartfelt stories of love, resilience, and community, discover how theyre not just settling in, but helping Taiwan shine brighter.

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep14
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Reuniting with her childhood friend Bi-zhong, a quiet romance rekindles. Meanwhile, a fiery connection sparks with architect Zhi-bin during a renovation project. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep144
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep131
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep132
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. programme.title: Just Eat Ep51
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2398
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep145
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5183
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: After legendary kung fu star Jackie Chan adopts the panda Hu Hu, an international crime syndicate places a massive bounty on the bear. Joined by his agent and Hu Hus caretaker, Jackie embarks on a daring quest to outsmart the villains.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: A massive fire caused by illegal garbage smuggling has triggered a radiation crisis in Hong Kong. Government advisor Simon joins the crisis response team led by Acting Chief Executive to avert the disaster. A fire brigade is tasked to enter the radiation zone and stop the cesium fallout. Facing the unprecedented catastrophe, can they save the city?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wong's disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professor's assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liang's masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Gang Master
programme.desc: This is a story about an army out to destroy the Hsien Lung gang of anti-Yuan revolutionaries. Their leader Ru Yi Tu is up against Fu Zhong Yuan, the identified successor of the Hsien Lung gang who must also prove his own legitimacy. The plot thickens with murder, sibling rivalry and shocking discoveries that could change the course of history.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: Yang Guo and Xiao Long Nu are deeply in love and live harmoniously in the ancient tomb. Xiao Long Nu proposes marriage one day but Yang Guo declines. Heartbroken, she leaves without a word. Devastated by her absence, Yang Guo searches tirelessly for her. When they finally reunite, he begs her to marry himonly for her to refuse his proposal.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and you've got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and you've got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Clans Of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Cave Of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother's Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls' high school, is stuck with a baby that isn't his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moths clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Eat Or Be Eaten - Go up against predatory insects that are tailor-made for killing. See why the terrifying praying mantis has the agility of a martial artist and an appetite for everything from flies to hummingbirds, then go hunting in mid-air with deadly dragonflies.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beetle Mania - Get a sanitation lesson from natures original cleanup crew. Learn how beetles keep ecosystems in balance with clever biological weapons like tusks and toxic sprays, then see why the 6,000-plus species of dung beetles are the worlds unsung heroes.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Turtle Beach S
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Pirate Birds - Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenyas rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Indonesia - Life in the Muck - Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. In this mucky ecosystem, predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race developing unlikely techniques of attack and defense.

programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep20
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher - The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.desc: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game - King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.desc: From Days Long Ago - The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCats sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things dont go precisely to plan.

programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep65

Crispin puts the new companys loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6

Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Zero Waste - When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble At The Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starlas barn.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay - The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp Out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save the Salmon - The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run - Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Daddy's Favorite / The Goldie Standard - The Sharks compete in a gameshow to devide which of them is Daddy's favorite. // Goldie attempts to win over a fishy who isn't her biggest fan.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Blizz's Big Bite / Friend of a Friend - Baby and William help Blizzard Wizard try new foods around Carnivore Cove. // Bait gets jealous of Switch's new friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1119
programme.desc: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga - When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1120
programme.desc: Pups and the Power of Flowers / Pups Save the Alien Egg - Humdinger tries to swipe the florist's Easter decorations and winds up on a runaway wagon with Mayor Goodway. // Mysterious Alien Easter Eggs cause trouble in Adventure Bay, the Paw Patrol and their Alien Friend will team up to catch them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II - Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Going With The Flow / The Decoder - The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away! Will a giant butterfly garden help bring it back?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds A Super Snack Dispenser - Rubble & Crew's favorite book series has new additions! But when there's no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Tongue Twisted Troll / Chompy and the Cloud Flower - Dora and Boots help Grumpy Old Troll untwist his tongue with Quickatoo's help. // Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Renewable Energy Racers - Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1019
programme.desc: Pups Save the Elephant Spa / Pups Save an Underwater Otis - While trying to save Traveling Travis, Ryder and the pups stumble across the legendary Elephants Spa. // Uncle Otis believes he's found gold but when Sid the Pirate tries to jump on Otis's claim, Otis gets trapped in a sunken shipping container.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Take the Cake - Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him. The race is on to get their cake baked and to the competition on time!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut - Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Shooting Star / Ball / Balloon - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. // Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. // Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep724
programme.desc: The Robot Championship - It's the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday! // Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map - After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep315
programme.desc: The William Manta Show / The Musical Mystery - William hosts his very own TV show. // Chucks and Ezra set out to find a special song.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep314
programme.desc: The Nice Off / Substitute Toothfish Fairy - Shadow and Aggie learn to be nice. // The Toothfish Fairy asks Daddy Shark to take her place.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppas car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dogs garage isnt far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppas car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Birth / The Revelation - Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Family / The House of Barbapapa - Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Franois' parents built for him. // The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabb have arrived in his life.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1124
programme.desc: Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut / Pups Save the Big Nightlight - Alex's french-fry costume gets him carried off by a flock of hungry seagulls. // Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1125
programme.desc: Skye's Road Trip Rescue - Skye, Liberty and Everest head off on a road trip in a cool new RV. But when a baby moose, rabbit and bear go missing.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paper Landscapes / Cowgirl - Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Shooting Star / Ball / Balloon - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. // Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. // Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hair Salon / The Crew Builds A Colorful Crystal Show - Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating... with the coolest light show the pups have ever seen!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it!

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Tio Tesoro's Treasure / The Great Key Mystery - Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again. // Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Dora's great-great grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep710
programme.desc: The Baby Robot From Outer Space - Special Mission Blaze is on the case! When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1021
programme.desc: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament - Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppas playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep518
