programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Gabriel's Cornish Pasties - Gabriel is making Cornish Pasties today. He shows us a really clever way to crimp a pastry case and serves the pasties in a traditional way. Will his friends like them too?

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear Cubs - In this episode Andy, Jen & Scout head to Alaska, in America, on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of fish being buried underground. Along the way, Andy meets a grizzly bear cub setting out on its first fishing trip with its mother to catch salmon.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Back - In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Panda And Krash S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Castle Calamity - Rori is building a castle with building blocks, which intrigues everyone.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Keepy Uppy - Bluey, Bingo and Mum are enjoying playing Keepy-Uppy around the house, when Dad joins in and the game becomes the ultimate test of skill.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cheese Moon - It's a space race as Supertato helps Carrot fly her baguette rocket to be the first Veggie on the Cheese Moon but half way there Evil Pea crashes into them making them crash land.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep93
programme.desc: Cold - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies who are warm, inside. The Teletubbies put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Silly Things - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Planet Pop Beam - The friends travel into outer space to visit Planet Popbeam. Mae-Mae wonders if the planet is made of cheese, but Phoebe thinks it's made of rock.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Dog Loves Dinosaurs - Dog and Pug go an adventure underground where they meet Granny Pug. They slide down a tunnel to the centre of the earth. When they arrive, they find some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Messy Music - Messy and friends must play the OKIDO concert. It's time for OKIDO to make some noise.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido S1 Ep42
programme.desc: A Sock Too Far - When Messy and his friends go camping with a robot who can do anything, there is a giant-sized sock accident!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Wild Thing - Monty and Jimmy Jones think it would be exciting to have a pet lion and wonder why you can't keep wild animals at home.

programme.title: Jojo & Gran Gran S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mother's Day - Four generations of JoJo's family - JoJo, Mummy, Gran Gran and Great-Gran-Gran - have a relaxing spa day together as they celebrate Mother's Day!

programme.title: Jojo & Gran Gran S2 Ep40
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Sorrel Drink - JoJo & Gran Gran make Sorrel drinks together, and JoJo comes up with her own recipe that uses her favourite ingredients.

programme.title: Sarah And Duck S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Origami Overload - John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Sarah And Duck S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired to put on a show.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep16
programme.desc: Kenji on the Rails Again - When Kenji hears that he must travel home to Japan alone, he gets scared and tries to hide. So, Thomas sets out to find him

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Kaizoku: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 27, Day 14 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Miyazaki Prefecture is known for its spirits. The spicy local ramen is the perfect pairing for a night on the town!

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Hina dolls, which represent the emperor, empress, and the imperial court, are presented to girls on the first March 3rd, Girl's Day celebration after they are born.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: asking for further information. Khine Mie Mie Soe, from Myanmar, makes floral arrangements for TV. In a roleplay challenge, she asks for more information about the flowers that a client wants.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Forester Omura Daisuke transforms harmful overgrown bamboo in the mountains of Japan into distinctive lights. Instead of seeing it as a nuisance he seeks ways for bamboo and humans to coexist.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: A Testament To Japanese Diplomacy

programme.title: Taekwondo Inspires Changes In Kids
programme.desc: A Brazilian couple who moved to Shiga Prefecture, Japan, teaches taekwondo to children. Their efforts are helping kids develop more than just athletically.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Kurosaki Yu is a blacksmith specializing in Echizen cutlery, a 700-year-old Japanese craft. His knives are sought after by chefs in Japan and overseas. He talks about achieving ultimate sharpness.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We follow US-born Jonathan Levine-Ogura in Hanamaki, Iwate, in his attempt to reach the 7th dan grade in kendo, and meet Canadian Ken Blaxley who crafts fishing rods in Shiwa, also in Iwate.

programme.title: Bosai:Large-Scale Blackouts
programme.desc: A large-scale blackout is the total loss of power in an entire region. Hokkaido's 2018 blackout had a major impact on medical care and logistics. Find out the mechanisms and how it can be prevented.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.desc: RAMUNE, a descendant of Japanese emigrants to Brazil, is a performer of rakugo, Japan's traditional storytelling. Performing in multiple languages, she helps foreigners experience Japanese culture.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN holds regular disaster mitigation seminars for international students, providing the knowledge that foreign residents need to stay safe. We introduce a seminar at Kanazawa University.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC306OMalleyvsDvalishvili
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his title for the second time against the indomitable wrestler Merab The Machine Dvalishvili.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS - Power, precision, perfection. Ligue 1s top 10 goals of 22/23 were of the highest order.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC313PereiravsAnkalaev
programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep802
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Battleground: Valle Flow, Unbreakable: Martinez Siblings, Ultimate Access: Royce Gracie" - We get an exclusive look inside the renowned Valle Flow Striking academy, where coach Mike Valle has forged elite champions like Julianna Pea and Belal Muhammad. David and Melissa Martinez make history as the first brother-sister duo to compete simultaneously in the UFC. We join Royce Gracie in Copacabana Brazil, where he visits his very first dojo.

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.
